name: Solar System Simulation (Fochello)
description:
Solar System Project made for the coursera game design and development course

I added several new elements to the simulation including

  1. New Skybox taken from the asset store in Unity
  2. New Sun textures and new Saturn textures also from the asset store
  3. Several more planets were added to the simulation.
  4. Speeds and sizes were modified to add realism to the simulation.
